explanation: [0-0] A man in a gray and black jacket walks up to a large, irregularly shaped LED screen. The screen displays a blue background with social media icons - Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, and Tiktok. The man taps the Instagram icon a few times with his left hand while holding a black device in his right hand.
[0-2] He brings the black device in his right hand closer to the Instagram icon on the screen, holding the edge of the screen with his left hand, and performs an action on the screen.
[0-2] He brings the black device in his right hand closer to the Instagram icon on the screen, holding the edge of the screen with his left hand, and performs an action on the screen.

[2-7] The scene zooms out, showing a portion of the blue screen and the stand behind it. A panel is missing in the upper left corner of the screen, revealing internal components and wiring. The man holds the black device in his right hand and removes the panel with the Instagram icon from the screen. He moves the panel to the empty space in the upper left corner. At this time, an orange YouTube icon appears on the screen. The man takes down the device with his right hand and pats the screen with his left hand.

[14-17] The man squats in the lower left corner of the screen, picks up a black panel placed on the left side of the screen with his left hand, and puts the black panel on the missing Tiktok icon panel in the lower left corner with both hands.
